Name: Classic Black Burqa with Waistcoat & Scarf
Description:
SKU: A572292
Fabric: Blended
Color: Black
The purpose of the Burqa  is to provide modesty and privacy for women in public spaces, in accordance with cultural and religious norms. It is often worn as a symbol of religious or cultural identity and may also be worn as a way to express individual style. The fabric has good elasticity, it is comfortable to handle, rich in texture, very comfortable and Breathable. This elegant and serious pure color Abaya long dress is very suitable for festivals, religious events, Muslims, prayers, Arab banquets, Eid, etc.

Description:

SMOOTH, SLEEK  LEATHER TRIM MAKE THIS SPACIOUS HAND BAG FOR EVERYDAY VERSATILITY AND ELEGANCE.
100% LEATHER
Welcome to iNFINITY Mega Mall! We offer an extensive range of high-quality bags to suit every style and occasion. From chic and sophisticated to casual and trendy, our collection has something for every woman.
Our bags are made from premium materials and crafted with precision to ensure they are both durable and stylish. We take pride in offering a wide range of designs, including totes, satchels, crossbody bags, backpacks, clutches, and more.
We understand the importance of functionality in a bag, which is why our collection features a variety of sizes and compartments to keep your belongings organized and easily accessible. Whether you’re looking for a spacious tote for your daily commute or a compact crossbody bag for a night out, we’ve got you covered.
